to share the wealth with its unionized work forces now that they are solidly profitable. It's a harder problem than it seems, since both have become solid moneymakers in part because of worker concessions. It was absolutely owed that we treat our people properly, CEO Sergio Marchionne told analysts and reporters on a conference call, as reported by the Free Press.`` The obligation to our people was much greater than the need to improve our bottom line profitability.''
